TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Index extends Microsoft.Azure.Documents.JsonSerializable

Docs.summary: Base class for IndexingPolicy Indexes in the Azure DocumentDB database service, you should use a concrete Index like HashIndex or RangeIndex.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the Azure DocumentDB database service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.HashIndex Hash(valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Documents.DataType dataType) cil managed

Docs.param: Specifies the target data type for the index path specification.
Docs.summary: Returns an instance of the class with specified DataType for the Azure DocumentDB database service.
Docs.example:
Here is an example to create HashIndex instance passing in the DataType:
HashIndex hashIndex = Index.Hash(DataType.String);

Docs.param: Specifies the target data type for the index path specification.
Specifies the precision to be used for the data type associated with this index.

HashIndex hashIndex = Index.Hash(DataType.String, 3);

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the kind of indexing to be applied in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
Docs.value: One of the values of the enumeration.
